title: Dead Block
description: Are you clever enough to survive a Zombie Armageddon? Don’t panic! Use your brain first and, if necessary, your sledgehammer. In the ‘50s Rock’n’Roll music was spawned straight from hell and was so evil that it turned dead people into Zombies! Three survivors - Jack Foster, a construction worker, Foxy Jones, a traffic warden, and Mike Bacon, a perpetually hungry boy scout - have formed an unlikely alliance to protect themselves from the invading undead. Hiding in abandoned buildings, they build blockades, set traps and – as a last resort – use weapons to fight the Zombies. Outlive the Zombie invasion alone or fight with your friends in split-screen cooperative mode.

childDownloads.title: More Dead to Block Map Pack
childDownloads.description: Zombies just never give up! Download the 'More dead to block' map pack for Dead Block, a unique action defense survival game, now! Help Jack, Mike and Foxy get through 4 all new dangerous and terrifying levels. Explore all of the additional maps, including a Slaughter House and Turkish Bath, in Single Player mode, or play with up to 3 of your friends in Multiplayer mode. Get ready to Rock’n’Roll and keep on Dead Blockin’!
